response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing both the financial and personal benefits of our offerings. Given its worth to you, we propose a purchase price of $950,000 for the product. This offer takes into account the value you place on it and aims to create a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further details.", "product_price": 950000}
